Text: EOTT FUTURE STRATEGY Cc ON BEHALF OF MIKE BURKE With your input I developed the following documents attached below about six months ago EOTT Guiding Documents EOTT Energy Strategies EOTT Core Competencies Company Strengths With your continued help what we now must do is to sharpen and focus our strategy and decide what we will select as the critical few core competencies of EOTT Trying to be all these thing to everybody id tantamount to being nothing for anyone We must find the unique value that we alone can and will deliver to our chosen market As outlined in Michael Tracys The Discipline of Market Leaders our task is to define and develop three essential concepts The value proposition The implicit promise EOTT will make to customers to deliver a particular combination of values price quality performance solution convenience etc The Value driven operations model The right combination of operating processes management systems business structure and culture that gives EOTT the capacity to deliver on its value proposition Value discipline EOTT must choose one of the three value disciplines below on which to stake our market reputation Operational Excellence Middle of the market productsservices at the best price with the least inconvenience or ProductServiceLeadership the very best performance in productservice or Customer Intimacy selectively chosen customersbest solution for unique customercustomer intimacy I will provide the first draft of a much more focused and disciplined strategy in the next few days Your input is always welcome

ISSUES AT EOTT Cc If there is anything I can do or get Mike to do in order to pull his team together then please let me know I am open to any suggestions or concerns you may have Mike has expressed an interest in me becoming a leader in developing the culture and morale Manager Employee Community Relations of EOTT I feel I can do an extremely good job at thisand could even do a better job if I had the help and support of Enron Please let me know your thoughts on thisI feel that being engaged more with Enron will show a significant difference at EOTT I think it is real important for EOTT Employees to feel like we are part of Enron as you know being a part of such a highly respected company adds quite a bit of valueas well as pride Some ideas Tapping into Enrons training and development Benefits Employee Recognition Programs Overall ideas Enron has that will assist in team building Mentoring Programs I just want you to know that I am willing to take on whatever task you would like to hand to meI am also very interested in finding out how EOTT can benefit from Enronanyone that you feel I should contact at Enronplease let me know I am ready to help make EOTT a wonderful and HAPPY place to workmaybe even a name change wouldnt be such a bad idea Thanks for listening Shelly
Organizational Announcement Cc ON BEHALF OF MIKE BURKE See attached EOTT Organizational Announcement

Re EOTT CFO position Cc are unable to open the attached please leave me a voice mail and I will assist you Thanks Shelly Michael Burke PM To Stanley nron Rod nron cc Shelly ott Subject EOTT CFO position I engaged Lou Rieger of SpencerStuart this past Monday morning I am asking Shelly to send you the job description I wrote and sent to Lou Please advise if you have any suggested changes Also I would like to try to keep this confidential the only others that I have told of this action are Dan Gibbs David Hultsman Mary Ellen Coombe Shelly Worrell
